Text:
Perfect DVDRip and a fast download... 
A/10 
V/10 
Plot: Some people are beyond help when it comes to meeting someone. An American Pie meets Male Bridget Jones. Jamie, age 29 going on 12, loser, virgin, stumbles upon a group of misfits who meet every week above a pub in order to discover the secrets of love, relationships and finding the perfect partner..... 
Fairly decent Brit comedy... 
Many Thanx to TvTeam and TASTE for the Great rip and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
